overview.welcomeMessage: Welcome to AIstein! Get started by creating your first prompt.
overview.description: AIstein is a powerful AI tool that helps you generate content for your social media posts.

features.title: Features
features.description: AIstein offers a variety of features to help you create content for your social media posts.
features.creator: @vojtatranta

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
validation.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number

profile.createProfileDescription: To create your resume, we first need some basic information about you.

randomTopic.describeImage: Describe what you see in this image
randomTopic.createSocialPostFromImage: Create a social media post based on this image
randomTopic.editTheImageWithContemporaryFilters: Edit this image with contemporary filters
randomTopic.makeTheImageLookLikeMadeOfFood: Transform this image to look like it's made of food

image.placeholder: Drop an image here or click to upload

generateSocialPostContentPromptTitle: Create content for your social media
generateSocialPostContentPromptDescripti: Write an idea for your social media content and our system will help you generate it. We have prepared a sample message in the message field so you can see how the system works.
generateSocialPostImageContentPromptTitl: Use images to create content for your social media
generateSocialPostImageContentPromptDesc: Upload an image to generate text for it. You can also let AI edit the image or generate an image completely from text. We have prepared a sample message in the message field so you can see how the system works.
